description: Cut with extra room in the thigh and a straight leg, Polo's most relaxed fit offers an easy silhouette without excess fabric and works for all body types. This pair is made from stretch cotton and treated to achieve a crisp white hue.
fitting_details: The Hampton Relaxed Straight: Our most classic-fitting jean sits slightly below the waist with a relaxed rise, an easy fit through the seat and the thigh, and a full straight leg.
Size 32W has a 9" rise and a 16" leg opening.
Belt loops. Button fly with a signature buttoned closure.
Five-pocket styling with signature metal rivets. Woven "Polo" label at the coin pocket.
Leather "Polo Ralph Lauren" patch at back right waist.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 32W x 32L.
